name: Angelina - Modern Sofa
description: To ensure complete blissful relaxation, we've designed the Angelina Modern Sofa with wraparound back cushions. Filled with pure feather, the cushions feel extra plump and the tilted arms free up precious inches of lounging space. The handmade sofa sits on elegant turned legs for a classic finish.

name: Oslo Corner Sofa Bed
description: The perfect medium sized corner sofa bed. With its simplistic contemporary styling, Oslo oozes class and sophistication. Choice of upholstery fabric is linen, a fabric that is cool to the touch, perfect for when it is used as a sofa bed.
measurement: Product Dimensions: H76 x W224 x D125cm

name: TV Trolley
description: Made from imported Canadian Red Oak Veneered engineered wood and processing wood.High quality environment friendly Italian Ultra Violet UV Lacquer in antique and natural finish.

name: Tea Table
description: Material - High density Particle Board (High grade premium engineering wood with natural Wood grain finish). Clean the dirt from the wooden surface with a slightly damp microfiber cloth using a wood friendly cleaning solution and immediately wipe the moisture with a dry, soft and lint-free cloth.

name: Wyndahl Dining Table
description: Inspired by heavy and hearty lodge-style furnishings from days gone by, the Wyndahl dining room extension table brings the past brilliantly into the present. Enticing with an aged pine color finish with light wire-brushed texture, this richly styled extension table with drop-in leaf and double pedestal base is reserved for those who appreciate furniture with great presence.
measurement: Dimensions: Width 48 in, Depth 103.25 in, Height 30.75 in

name: Show Case
description: Classic walnut show case with 2 doors for dining room. Solid wood details hand worked. Also available with 3 doors and gold leaf details.

name: Samba Camden Solid Oak Wide Sideboard
description: The Samba Camden wide sideboard is part of a rustic range of dining furniture, with no two pieces looking exactly the same in their colours and markings. Perfect as a storage location for your dinner set, and any other homeware items that you wish to tidy away until needed. The large top can be used for displaying a lamp, vases, or photo frames.

name: Dining Room Table
description: Vandana interiors jenpeg modern white marble dining table with rectangular tabletop, golden hexagonal-legged legs

name: Cabinet Sideboard
description: High-quality MDF board and metal legs ensure the durability of the sideboard. Besides, the kitchen buffet is quite smooth and meticulous and easy to clean, without any smell. This buffet cabinet features 3 transparent doors, it will perfectly updated your house decor. This elegant style cabinet is perfect for display and store.

name: Solid Sheesham Wood King Size Bed
description: Solid Sheesham Wood king size bed without storage bed for bedroom solid wooden furniture beds for home living room

name: Isabella Queen 5 Piece Bedroom Set
description: The bedroom is a reflection of character and the Isabella collection makes a bold character statement in any bedroom with its formal design. Traditional design styles including square finials, intricate wood detailing, matching curved paneling on the headboard and mirror, and bracket feet on a rich brown finish create plenty of character. The collection is constructed with Pine hardwood solids and veneers and front and back English dovetail drawer construction with felt lined top drawers and dust proof panels on the bottom drawers, providing extra durability and quality.

name: Sonomoa 7 Drawer Double Dresser with Mirror
description: The drawer chest is today's answer to the consumer's desire to have a classic cottage feel with up to date finish and style details. The popular wire-brushed gray and antique weathered white two-tone finish adds an element of sophistication to this casual lifestyle. True to form cottage/bungalow design elements of soft rounded corners, simply molded doors, and drawers, and tapered turned feet makes this collection perfect for any environment.
measurement: Largest Drawer Weight Capacity: 20 lb, Overall Width - Side to Side: 75 inch

name: White High Gloss 2 Drawer Bedside Table
description: The perfect piece for creating a contemporary abode, this modern bedside table would make a stylish addition to any bedroom. The 35cm depth makes it slightly shallower than standard, making it perfect for small bedrooms where you need to maximise floor space. The white high gloss finish gives it a natural shine, and it'll coordinate well with any decor. It features two drawers with integrated handles which give it a seamless look; for keeping your bedside essentials close at hand, yet clutter-free.
measurement: Overall dimensions: W45 x D35 x H43 cm

name: Antique Bedroom Wooden Almirah
